text: The Roy J. Carver Charitable Trust is a philanthropic group dedicated to the state of Iowa and, to a lesser extent, Illinois. It disperses about $15M annually. Most of the funding is directed to education and to biomedical research.https://www.carvertrust.org The Roy J. and Lucille A. Carver College of Medicine is supported by this foundation. ==References== Category:Medical and health foundations in the United States Category:Educational foundations in the United States
title: Roy J. Carver Charitable Trust
